casebody.data:
MICHAEL'S FLOOR COVERING, INC., petitioner,
v.
RESILIENT FLOOR COVERING PENSION FUND, et al. No. 15-1118. Supreme Court of the United States May 23, 2016.

Motion of Associated Builders and Contractors, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
